A Kerbal Anomaly Odyssey by 5thHorseman  
  
Highlighting the [Anomaly Surveyor Contract Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109471) & [Contract Configurator Mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604) by nightingale  
  
"Also Sprach Zarathustra"  
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)   
Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0  
[http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)
Wow, this is absolutely amazing! This is going to go straight on to the Anomaly Surveyor first post. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you! I had a lot of fun making it.

People on the YouTubes seem to like it as well.
